contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Our French-heritage linen duvet cover is lightweight, breathable, and guaranteed to keep you cozy all year round. The rouched style adds subtle texture and the border style offers a touch of color in a classic design.

content.value: Our French-heritage linen duvet cover is lightweight, breathable, and guaranteed to keep you cozy all year round. The rouched style adds subtle texture and the border style offers a touch of color in a classic design.
Ethically woven from 100% French flax
Corner ties inside to keep comforter in place
Button closure at the bottom
Crafted in Tiruppur, India

Machine washable. We recommend machine washing inside out on the delicate cycle with like colors, with cold water. Line dry, or tumble dry low and remove promptly. Use a steamer as needed. Use a hot iron as needed.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Ethically woven from 100% French flax
  • Corner ties inside to keep comforter in place
  • Button closure at the bottom
  • Crafted in Tiruppur, India
